name: Quintalist
description: Correctly choose the top 5 entries in 5 tries or fewer.

name: Monster Hunter-dle
description: Guess the monster in the Monster Hunter series.

name: Unshuffle
description: Unshuffle the grid using the numbers along each row and column as a guide.

name: Cancelwise
description: Cancel numbers in a way that the remaining tiles add up to the target numbers.

name: Worpel
description: Guess the player in the Australian Football League (AFL).

name: Estimadle
description: Estimate the number of circles within 10 seconds.

name: Tarkovdle
description: Guess the weapon from Escape from Tarkov by its properties or sound.

name: Wrodeo
description: Reveal the quote or book passage by guessing one word at a time, starting with some letters already shown.

name: Swapple
description: Swap letters such that every row and column is a word.

name: Heardle Daily
description: Guess the song by listening to small parts of it.

name: TF2dle
description: Guess the Team Fortress 2 weapon, map, cosmetic or unusual effect based on attributes.

name: Morsle (decipher.wiki)
description: Same as Wordle but you input your letters using Morse Code, a tool for beginners to learn Morse Code.

name: Decodex
description: A daily cryptography game. Decode a nice quote every day!

name: Silly Little Codes
description: Guess the word or phrase represented by today's code.

name: Nookle
description: Guess the villager from Animal Crossing.

name: TimeLine Game
description: Arrange the historical events in the order they happened.

name: Estimate Me
description: Each day features something new to estimate, such as 'How many jelly beans are in this jar?'

name: Palwordle
description: Daily games related to the video game Palworld.

name: Pokedle.com
description: Guess the daily Pokemon from all generations.

name: Bazaar Doku
description: Doku-style trivia game for The Bazaar.

name: Word Ladder
description: Change one word into another by switching one letter at a time, keeping a valid word at each step.

name: Emoji Test
description: Guess the hidden word represented by emojis.

name: Padlock
description: Number puzzle game inspired by Wordle and Mastermind.

name: Alphalock
description: Word puzzle game inspired by Wordle and Mastermind.

name: Duolock Game
description: Solve two Alphalock puzzles at the same time. Includes a Padlock (number) mode.

name: Birdie Game
description: Guess the bird from cropped images and audio.

name: CarGuesser
description: Guess the brand, model, and year of a car given pictures of parts of it.

name: Timdle
description: Place 8 historical events in chronological order.

name: Redividers
description: Find the word that fits the first blank, then split it to fill in the remaining blank(s).

name: WordLink
description: Rearrange the words to form a chain of two-word phrases.

name: Wordloop
description: Place segments on the circle such that each pair of segments forms a valid word.

name: Stacks
description: Stack words from the word bank to create new words going horizontally. (From The Atlantic)

name: Fluxis
description: Complete the chain by entering words that satisfy their category and build off the previous word. (From The Atlantic)

name: The Atlantic Crossword
description: A daily crossword from The Atlantic.

name: Chronle
description: Put the events in the order of when they happened.
